PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: This Privacy Policy explains how QuizLoop collects, uses, and protects your data.
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTED_BODY: We collect gameplay analytics events, quiz scores, streak and profile stats, and basic technical diagnostics needed to improve app quality.
PRIVACY.DATA_STORAGE_BODY: Data is stored locally on your device and can be optionally synced to cloud services through Firebase when sign-in/sync features are used.
PRIVACY.THIRD_PARTIES_BODY: QuizLoop integrates Firebase Analytics, Firebase Authentication, and AdMob. These providers may process usage data under their own privacy terms.
PRIVACY.USER_RIGHTS_BODY: You may request data export or deletion at any time and can contact support for account-related privacy requests.
PRIVACY.GDPR_BODY: QuizLoop requests user consent before personalized advertising and provides consent controls aligned with GDPR principles.
PRIVACY.COPPA_BODY: QuizLoop is not directed to children under 13 and does not knowingly collect personal data from children.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service

TERMS.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_BODY: QuizLoop provides quiz gameplay, leaderboards, profile tracking, and optional rewarded/premium features.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_BODY: You may play anonymously or sign in with Google for sync features. You are responsible for activity under your account.
TERMS.PURCHASES_BODY: Purchases are non-refundable unless required by law. Premium plans remove ads and unlock additional benefits.
TERMS.PROHIBITED_BODY: You must not abuse, reverse engineer, automate, cheat, exploit vulnerabilities, or interfere with other users or services.
TERMS.WARRANTIES_BODY: QuizLoop is provided "as is" without warranties of uninterrupted service, accuracy, or fitness for a particular purpose.
TERMS.LIABILITY_BODY: To the maximum extent permitted by law, QuizLoop is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
TERMS.CHANGES_BODY: We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use after updates means you accept the revised Terms.
